title: Do well with cache with nuxt
body:
Automatically check if the current code is up to date and update the cache.

#### verification environment
-NUXT: 2.15.8
- @NUXTJS/PWA: 3.3.5

#### code
`nuxt.config.js`

`` `js
{
  Plugins: ['Plugins/Prompt-update.js']
}
`` `

`Plugins/Prompt-update.js`

`` `js
Export default async () => {
  IF ('ServiceWorker' in Navigator) {
    Navigator.serviceWorker.GetRegization ("/sw.js"). THEN (Registration => {
      SetInterval (() => {Registration.Update ()}, 1000)
      Registration.onupDatefound = () => Window.location.reload ()
    })
  }
}
`` `

Please specify the `1000` part of` set interval` arbitrarily specify the update span (milliseconds)
The request is sent to `/sw.js` by` Registration.Update () `, detecting that the value of the` Revision` inside has changed, and reloading it.

#### operation confirmation method
`NPM RUN GENERATE`,` HTTP -Server Dist/ -P 3000` Distribution, change the internal file and Generate again to confirm that it will be updated automatically.

You can check that the `Sw.js` update is checked in the following network log.
`` `
[2022-02-05T11: 06: 44.398z] "Get /sw.js" "Mozilla /5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) ..."
`` `
